We are firmly committed to producing high-quality products that combine nourishment with value pricing, as they strive to become one of Nigeria’s largest indigenous foodmanufacturers on a global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales and Marketing Executive

Job Locations: Abakaliki - Ebonyi, Katsina, Bayelsa, Kogi, Calabar - Cross River, Benin - Edo and Aba - Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	As a Sales and Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for driving product sales, building strong customer relationships, and implementing strategic marketing initiatives in your assigned territory.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify new business opportunities and increase market penetration.
	Execute effective sales strategies to achieve targets.
	Maintain and grow relationships with distributors, wholesalers, and retailers.
	Monitor competitor activities and provide relevant market intelligence.
	Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly sales reports.
	Represent the company professionally in the assigned region.


Requirements


	B.Sc. or HND in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a sales/marketing role within the FMCG sector.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Target-driven, self-motivated, and result-oriented.
	Must reside in or be willing to relocate to the preferred location.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:recruitment@eriscofoodsltd.com.ngusing the Job Position as the subject of the email. Example: Sales and Marketing Executive - Kogi.

title: Human Resources Manager Job at Future Moves Recruitment Agency
content:
Future Moves Recruitment Agency is a licensed full-fledged Human Resource firm with extensive expertise and experience in human Capital development and staffing. Future Moves has exceptional expertise in Talent Sourcing, learning & development, talent management, HR Outsourcing & Payrolling, HR planning & Consulting, Policy Drafting, Culture Change and Organisation Effectiveness by designing and implementing interventions which identify the core areas of development to enhance the overall growth and competitiveness of your organisation.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Manager
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid (3 days onsite and 2 days Remote)
Industry: Luxury Lighting / Electrical Solutions / Turnkey Interiors

About the Role


	We are seeking a proactive HR Executive to manage recruitment, employee relations, performance management, training, and compliance for both factory and administrative staff.
	This role ensures HR policies are implemented effectively while fostering a positive work environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and workforce planning.
	Implement HR policies, handle employee relations, and address grievances.
	Oversee training programs to improve staff productivity.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, payroll accuracy, and benefits administration.
	Monitor performance appraisals and staff engagement initiatives.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field.
	3 years of HR experience, preferably in manufacturing or industrial sectors.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in HR software and Microsoft Office Suite.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 Monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a copy of their valid driver’s license to: L.recruiter@fmragency.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Content Creator",
  "description": "Pulse is Africa&rsquo;s leading innovative media company, informing and engaging Africa&rsquo;s young audience - and providing expansive media reach and creative marketing solutions to partners. We run news websites and social channels and marketing and production across Francophone and Anglophone West Africa and East Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The role focuses on creating engaging video and written content for Pulse Nigeria&#39;s social media platforms.
	It involves managing community interactions, tracking performance metrics, and optimizing content strategy.
	The position requires trend monitoring, campaign execution, and collaboration across internal teams.
	Ultimately, it aims to grow brand visibility, audience engagement, and support overall business goals.


Duties and Responsibilities


	Develop high-quality video content for Pulse Nigeria&#39;s social media platforms.
	Create engaging captions, headlines, and descriptions that drive audience interaction.
	Conduct research to stay up-to-date on industry trends and topics.
	Create video content that resonate to the Pulse Nigeria audience to maximize engagement and reach
	Provide regular reporting on content and social media performance.
	Use data to inform future content and social media strategies.
	Monitor interactions on the Pulse Nigeria page to create timely content in a professional manner
	Track and analyze engagement metrics (e.g., likes, comments, shares, etc.) to measure content performance.
	Become an advocate for the Company in social media spaces, engaging in dialogues and answering questions where appropriate.
	Demonstrate ability to map out marketing strategies and then drive that strategy proven by testing and metrics.
	Monitor trends in social media tools, applications, channels, design and strategy.

Social Media Content Creator Job at Pulse Nigeria




        
    

        
        Pulse is Africa’s leading innovative media company, informing and engaging Africa’s young audience - and providing expansive media reach and creative marketing solutions to partners. We run news websites and social channels and marketing and production across Francophone and Anglophone West Africa and East Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Content Creator

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The role focuses on creating engaging video and written content for Pulse Nigeria's social media platforms.
	It involves managing community interactions, tracking performance metrics, and optimizing content strategy.
	The position requires trend monitoring, campaign execution, and collaboration across internal teams.
	Ultimately, it aims to grow brand visibility, audience engagement, and support overall business goals.


Duties and Responsibilities


	Develop high-quality video content for Pulse Nigeria's social media platforms.
	Create engaging captions, headlines, and descriptions that drive audience interaction.
	Conduct research to stay up-to-date on industry trends and topics.
	Create video content that resonate to the Pulse Nigeria audience to maximize engagement and reach
	Provide regular reporting on content and social media performance.
	Use data to inform future content and social media strategies.
	Monitor interactions on the Pulse Nigeria page to create timely content in a professional manner
	Track and analyze engagement metrics (e.g., likes, comments, shares, etc.) to measure content performance.
	Become an advocate for the Company in social media spaces, engaging in dialogues and answering questions where appropriate.
	Demonstrate ability to map out marketing strategies and then drive that strategy proven by testing and metrics.
	Monitor trends in social media tools, applications, channels, design and strategy.
	Identify threats and opportunities in user generated content surrounding the business - Report notable threats to appropriate management.
	Analyze campaigns and translate anecdotal or qualitative data into recommendations and plans for revising the social media campaigns.
	Monitor effective benchmarks (best practices) for measuring the impact of social media campaigns. Analyze, review and report on effectiveness of campaigns in an effort to maximise results.
	Collaborate with other teams: Editorial, Video, and Sales teams to achieve company wide goals.
	Manage Social Media campaigns and day-to-day activities in line with KPIs including:
	Community management - daily spam check across all the channels and other commenting systems.
	Approve comments when necessary & quick response/monitoringof comments following the standard guidelines.
	Monitor trends and happenings across channels using social media tools such as; Analytics, Meta Business Suite, etc. and ensure time-to-market for the content distribution is efficient.
	Complete reports - social media weekly, general weekly online marketing report and traffic analysis report when necessary.
	Complete Experiment briefs for tests conducted and properly documented in the marketing folder.
	Create posts for special campaigns (clients) when necessary on all social media channels and compile reports for analysis.
	Proper implementation of specification and structure document - to be used as a guide for all posts and updated when necessary.
	Ensure proper distribution of all content types across assigned channels.
	Ensure all social media posts are correctly UTM tagged for tracking.
	Develop new social media strategies & ideas with proper implementation of these strategies for the growth of the brands.
	Event coverage for Pulse Nigeria & Pulse clients based on communicated briefs; cover events highlights and distribute content across relevant channels & provide performance Reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, Public Relations, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in social media management
	Understanding of Social Media Strategy
	Content editing, and basic knowledge of design tools (e.g., Canva, Capcut)
	Understanding of major social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok)
	Communication Skills
	Analytical Skills
	Customer Service Skills
	Familiarity with social media management tools (e.g., Buffer, Sprout Social).


Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience
	Hybrid work options
	Health Insurance Cover
	Group Life Insurance cover
	Contributory Pension Scheme
	Annual Bonuses
	Telecommunication allowance.
